item.title: 1 dead, 7 injured after Tesla Cybertruck explodes outside Trump's Las Vegas hotel
item.description: A Cybertruck that appeared to be carrying fireworks caught fire and exploded on Wednesday morning, authorities say. One person died inside the vehicle, while seven who were nearby received minor injuries.

item.title: 21 states are getting minimum wage bumps in 2025
item.description: Increases in Delaware, Illinois and Rhode Island will bring those states' minimums to $15 an hour, meaning 10 states and Washington, D.C., will now have $15 or higher minimum wage.
